abilities.name: loaded dice
abilities.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.

abilities.name: wild cards
abilities.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

abilities.name: pick a card
abilities.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

abilities.name: stacked deck
abilities.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.

abilities.name: destiny
abilities.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
